1417170.name: Don't Miss The King
1417170.description: Dont miss the king is a strategy-platformer game that lets you strategize while you are in battle. You will be able to fight using different types of soldiers on many different maps in this game where you have to defeat a dark wizard-king who is trying to take all of humanity under his will.  You have to save the humanity!!
1417170.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
developers: Casus Belli Game and Animation Studios
publishers: Casus Belli Game and Animation Studios
